title: FS T206 Cycle 460 White and Berger
author: hcv123

posts.post_title: FS T206 Cycle 460 White and Berger
posts.post_content:
Rare Cycle 460 backs of Berger (combined SGC and PSA pop of 8) and White (combined PSA and SGC pop of 10).  Cards are offered individually.  I will sell to the best offer (offers accepted by Private Message only - posted offers will be ignored/excluded) over $275 for each card that I have by this Friday at Noon (12PM) Eastern.  You can make 1 offer for each card.  I will not be posting offers, just selling to the best 1 I have by Friday.  Offer includes insured delivery and net payment to me (your exact offer by Paypal friends and family or +3% by Paypal goods and services).  Checks and money orders also accepted.  
Berger has 2 horizontal creases Just below his arms and another across his face as well as a light stain in the top right quadrant of the card.
White has a crease in the lower right quadrant and others in the upper right and lower left corners.  Very slight wet sheet transfer.  This card has very nice eye appeal.
Last bump  - offers due before noon tomorrow (Friday).
Thank you for all offers.  The member with the highest offer has been notified by PM
